meanings.definition: The quality or state of being brass.
meanings.sent1: Her brassinesses in handling difficult situations impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The brassinesses of the doorknob gave it a shiny appearance.
meanings.sent3: Despite her small size, her brassinesses in standing up to bullies was admirable.
meanings.sent4: His speech was filled with the brassinesses of a true leader.
meanings.sent5: The sun reflected off the brassinesses of the trumpet, creating a dazzling effect.

meanings.sent1: The brassinesses of the trumpet echoed through the concert hall.
meanings.sent2: I love the rich brassinesses of a marching band.
meanings.sent3: The brassinesses of the tuba made the audience tap their feet.
meanings.sent4: The brassinesses of the trombone added depth to the music.
meanings.sent5: The brassinesses of the horn section filled the room with energy.

meanings.definition: The boldness or audacity of someone.
meanings.sent1: Her brassinesses in asking for a raise surprised her boss.
meanings.sent2: He faced the challenge with the brassinesses of a true warrior.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel showed its brassinesses by stealing nuts from the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: His brassinesses in negotiating the deal earned him respect.
meanings.sent5: The comedian's brassinesses on stage kept the audience laughing.
